DOC.detailed_description: The prosthetic foot : one SACH foot ( Otto Bock - foot C , advertise activity category 1 ) two DER foot ( Dynamic Motion Otto Bock - foot B , advertise activity category 2-3 ; Triton Otto Bock - foot A , advertised activity category 3-4 ) . All prosthetic foot size choose patient 's weight . They cover neither patient professional able see prosthetic foot use . After trial also perform one-leg stand test ( three repetition ) 10-meter walk test . Before trial , patient give 15 minute adaptation new prosthetic foot without presence assessor .
